snippet.title: Frebbventure Alliance - SAGE 24 trailer
snippet.description:
Check it out here! https://almyriganhero.itch.io/frebbventure-alliance

Technically the game has been downloadable and playable for a good few weeks now, but I wanted to really get things down pat before I made an announcement video. A slightly updated build will be available for Sonic Amateur Games Expo 2024, but for the time being, I consider this a very presentable version of the game. It's got all the what-if-Sakurai-made-Sonic action you've come to expect from the first game, and so much more.
